title: Google assistant is interfering with my phone calls. How do I change my settings or turn this off?
content:
Google assistant is interfering with all of my phone calls.  It blocks numbers that are legitimate. 

It's not giving me the opportunity to decide when a number is legit or not.

When screening calls the number doesn't stay up on the screen long enough for me to answer when I am waiting for a call. 

I want to be able to adjust Google assistant settings to level I want to control.  I'm unemployed. I don't want to miss any call or have an employer be screened by Google assistant.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4 XL
